duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform daily maintenance and repair of equipment in a healthcare setting.
Troubleshoot issues with equipment and perform necessary repairs.
Execute preventive maintenance procedures to ensure equipment reliability and safety.
Read and interpret technical manuals and schematics for equipment maintenance.
Work independently and as part of a team to ensure overall industrial maintenance.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent; technical school or certification in related field is a plus
